name: session
title: Session - Pomodoro Focus Timer
description: Control Session pomodoro timers. Requires v2.1.6 or later installed: www.stayinsession.com
author: jameslyons

commands.name: session-start-new
commands.title: Start New Session
commands.description: Starts a focus session in Session app

commands.name: session-start-previous
commands.title: Start Previous Session
commands.description: Starts a focus session in Session app with the previous intent and duration

commands.name: session-pause
commands.title: Pause Session
commands.description: Pauses a focus session in Session app

commands.name: session-finish
commands.title: Finish Session
commands.description: Finishes a focus session in Session app

commands.name: session-abandon
commands.title: Abandon Session
commands.description: Abandons a focus session in Session app
